title: 19 - Hard Things Build Strong Kids with Caroline Allen
description:
I pray this episode causes so much hope in you and in your kids. My daughter Caroline is resilient and has battled dyslexia since 5th grade and her faith has been built like nothing else. I love that you’ll get to hear her story in this episode!

Find Get Out of Your Head book: getoutofyourheadbook.com

A seriously fun camp for your whole family: https://pine.co.ve/Jennie_10
